name: .22 PLZ SEND MY SHITTY SHOES THEIR COMPETITOR'S CEO. Lucky Lucy van Delft
description:
original purchase: sept 29, 2016
wore daily for a year - had to send back for adding glue and stitches
end-dec 2021 - shoes have completely disintegrated
company - won't respond to messages
shoemaker - states the company doesnt release soles. if they did, it'd cost 120 euros to fix these
store - said my expectations were too high for the lowly price of 200 euros. even though i asked specifically for shoes that i could continue to resole over the years

https://glavx.org/2021/12/13/outdoor-clothing-the-hiking-boots-dasslers-hawag-wants-to-catch-up-with-lowa-with-new-soles/

according to this article, hanwag and lowa have a longstanding rivalry. so please help me send my shitty ass shoes to LOWA - the competitor of the creators of this crapfest of hiking boots. here's hoping upon receipt, the guy is petty enough to do something with this information and at least makes fun of the hanwag ceo a little bit at their next mutual industry event.

1/1 NFT - yes only one! all for you

the cost of this NFT will go towards international shipping, plus i added a little extra for my troubles. not enough for new shoes tho.
